title: Audit node-pty architecture before UI integration
description: Research audit before MP-007. Review docs.local/live-ui-research/ findings, understand node-pty patterns, document what needs to be built. Output: docs.local/audit-node-pty.md

acceptanceCriteria.text: List all components needed: pty-wrapper, dual-output, event-emitter
Document file structure per research recommendation
Identify existing ralph-ui code that needs modification
Document event format (type, timestamp, data, ansi, exitCode)
Document dual-stream architecture (display vs file path)
Document TTY detection edge cases (CI, non-TTY)
List potential breaking changes to current ralph-ui
Run CodeRabbit review - must pass (or create BUG if unfixable)
Commit: docs: AUDIT-003 node-pty architecture audit
